mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_COTAINFSGMT (COTAINFSGMTSEQNO, CONADDDISTRICTCODE, CONADD, CONPHONE, FINCONPHONE, COTAINFOUPDATE) values (#{CotaInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ConAddDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ConAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ConPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FinConPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CotaInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_COTAINFSGMT set CONADDDISTRICTCODE = #{ConAddDistrictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONADD = #{ConAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONPHONE = #{ConPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINCONPHONE = #{FinConPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COTAINFOUPDATE = #{CotaInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reportFlag = #{reportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COTAINFSGMTSEQNO = #{CotaInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select COTAINFSGMTSEQNO, CONADDDISTRICTCODE, CONADD, CONPHONE, FINCONPHONE, COTAINFOUPDATE from PBCRS_REPORT_COTAINFSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_COTAINFSGMTM (COTAINFSGMTSEQNO, CONADDDISTRICTCODE, CONADD, CONPHONE, FINCONPHONE, COTAINFOUPDATE,reportflag,sourcesys,etl_date) select COTAINFSGMTSEQNO, CONADDDISTRICTCODE, CONADD, CONPHONE, FINCONPHONE, COTAINFOUPDATE,'0',sourcesys,to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_COTAINFSGMT where COTAINFSGMTSEQNO = #{CotaInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
